item.title: query views
item.description: Note: This place is currently a placeholder, hugo gets upset if links are missing. Queries are build in a language called datalog, the presentation is done using Hiccup. item.title: Hiccup
item.description: Hiccup is a domain-specific language for generating HTML, used mostly in Clojure community. For every day use you need very little knowledge of Hiccup, and fortunately (most of it) is surprisingly simple.
